title: Introducing AskUI CLI 2.0
excerpt: Major update brings enhanced model support, improved orchestration, and new sandbox management capabilities.
content:
We're excited to announce AskUI CLI 2.0, a major update that brings significant improvements to our command-line interface.

## Enhanced Model Support

New model integrations provide better accuracy and performance for your automation tasks.

## Improved Orchestration

Our orchestration engine has been completely redesigned for better reliability and performance.

## Sandbox Management

New sandbox management features make it easier to manage your testing environments.

## Migration Guide

Upgrading is straightforward. Check our documentation for step-by-step instructions.
author: AskUI Team
